full_description:
Power Pac 1KVA Online UPS

The Power Pac 1KVA Online UPS is a sturdy and trustworthy option for protecting important equipment from power outages and fluctuations. This UPS, designed with accuracy, includes a wide range of capabilities geared to fulfill the needs of modern organizations and sensitive electrical equipment. The input voltage range of 160V to 270V allows for compatibility with various power sources. The output voltage is steady at 220V ±1%, ensuring reliable operation of connected equipment. Operating on a single-phase system, the UPS has an exceptionally fast transfer time of zero, providing smooth transitions between power sources with no disturbances to connected devices. This dependability is further strengthened by its use of double conversion technology, which transforms incoming AC power to DC. The Power Pac UPS is designed to supply power with accuracy, with a frequency of 50Hz and a perfect sine wave output. This high degree of precision makes it appropriate for powering delicate electronic equipment that demands reliable, distortion-free electricity. The UPS has a backup period of 15 minutes, which is made possible by a powerful 12V; 7Ah X 3 battery. This guarantees that key systems continue to function during short-term power outages, reducing downtime and safeguarding against data loss or equipment damage. Furthermore, with a power factor of 0.7 and generator compatibility features, the Power Pac UPS enhances power management efficiency and adaptability. Whether used in commercial, data center, or industrial settings, this UPS delivers dependable and efficient power protection, protecting critical equipment and assuring business continuity. The Power Pac 1KVA Online UPS is a complete power protection solution that combines sophisticated technology, dependability, and agility to satisfy the diversified demands of modern enterprises and important applications.

Power Pac 3KVA Online UPS

The Power Pac 3KVA Online UPS is an innovative power backup system that has been precisely designed to offer dependable and uninterrupted power to essential equipment. Operating as an online UPS, it provides continuous power protection by continually delivering power from its internal batteries, with no transfer time between mains power and battery backup. This capability is critical in locations where even the slightest power outage might result in data loss, equipment damage, or downtime. The Power Pac 3KVA Online UPS is intended to fulfill the needs of modern enterprises and essential applications. Its rugged construction and high-quality components assure dependable operation even in harsh environments. This proactive approach to power management allows users to discover and resolve possible issues before they worsen, reducing downtime and increasing productivity. The Power Pac 3KVA Online UPS is a versatile, dependable, and efficient power backup system that can be used for a variety of applications. With its innovative features, strong construction, and consistent performance, it assures continuous power supply, protects costly equipment, and assists companies in maintaining continuity even in the face of unexpected power outages or fluctuations.
